TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Cipawkan, title = Cipawkan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cipawkan} }

S.FORM: == satangahan == niyazu' nu Cipawkan i Kalingku. u sulit nu Hulam: 吉寶干/德安部落 Cipawkan i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Cipawkan. u kasalumaluma' nu Cipawkan sa, 2,448 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 6,662 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,051 ku tademaw, pakalatu 16%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 5,611 ku tademaw, pakalatu 84%. u kasabinacadan, Amis 13%, Truku 2%, zumazuma 0.5%. duut ku Pangcah(Amis) itini, caayka duut kuzuma a tademaw. malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

== satangahan == niyazo' no Cipawkan i Kalingko. o solit no Holam: 吉寶干/德安部落 Cipawkan i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Cipawkan. o kasalomaloma' no Cipawkan sa, 2,448 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 6,662 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,051 ko tademaw, pakalato 16%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 5,611 ko tademaw, pakalato 84%. o kasabinacadan, Amis 13%, Troko 2%, zomazoma 0.5%. doot ko Pangcah(Amis) itini, caayka doot kozoma a tademaw. malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
